ygData.subject: Re: A new yahoo group
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Me too as for the newbie questions that is the main reason the new group was formed to keep the quwstions and strings on EQ and not on spam, and check out
ygData.messageBody:
> I sort of enjoy the newbie questions and silly
> posts...


Me too as for the newbie questions that is the main reason the new
group was formed to keep the quwstions and strings on EQ and not on
spam, and "check out this website and the pics...ect".

maybe I used words to "strong" for some but there are people who just
what to get and share info. on eq. Other groups allow non-EQ strings
and posts. That what we are trying to Avoid here. "Just EQ, and
nothing but the EQ ma'am" a para-phrasa from the old TV show "DRAGNET"

Wolff
